image:image.image:title: Login Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the Login page

url.description: This vibrant login page welcomes you to the world of GBT Trust - Ganpati Balaji Trust, your gateway to seamless access and personalized experiences. Unlock the doors to a community-driven platform designed to serve you with utmost trust and devotion. Embrace convenience, security, and empowerment every time you login.

image:image.image:title: Sign Up Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the sign up page

url.description: Join our vibrant community with ease! Sign up now and unlock exclusive benefits with a simple click. Enter your referral code to embark on a journey enriched with rewards and camaraderie. Experience the joy of seamless registration and dive into a world of opportunities. Your adventure begins here!

image:image.image:title: Dashboard Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the Dashboard page

url.description: Empower with insights on our dynamic dashboard! Explore personalized stats, vibrant community data, collective achievements. Experience data-driven decisions and community engagement, all in one place.

image:image.image:title: Profile Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the profile page

url.description: Elevate your profile! Easily customize personal details, correct discrepancies, add bank account info and DOB. Refine your digital identity for seamless community interactions. Empower yourself with control and convenience.

image:image.image:title: Payment Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the Payment page

url.description: Unlock community benefits! Join and unlock referral system eligibility with a Rs. 580 payment. Start your journey with us today!

image:image.image:title: Team Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the Team page

url.description: Keep tabs on your team's progress effortlessly with our Team page! Monitor achievements and growth, track milestones, and celebrate contributions. Foster collaboration and synergy among team members, driving towards shared goals and celebrating collective success.

image:image.image:title: Program Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the Program page

url.description: Propose charity programs and impactful initiatives easily on our platform! Share ideas for meaningful projects that make a difference. Simplify suggesting charitable endeavors and impactful activities. Empower community engagement by advocating noble causes, inspiring positive change.

image:image.image:title: Request Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the Request page

url.description: Initiate quick and secure fund transfers from your wallet to your bank account through our request page. Simplify financial transactions with seamless money transfers, ensuring convenience and control over your funds.

image:image.image:title: Refers Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the Refers page

url.description: Effortlessly manage your referrals on our Refer page! Copy and share your referral URL via email or other channels. Track user progress to see which steps they've completed, empowering you to guide them effectively. Maximize your referral potential with ease, leveraging our user-friendly interface to expand your network and maximize rewards.

image:image.image:title: Tree Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the Tree page

url.description: Visualize and navigate your referral network effortlessly with our interactive tree page! Easily track connections, identify key referrals, and expand your network with clarity and precision.

image:image.image:title: epin Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the epin page

url.description: Reset your password using this page.

image:image.image:title: statements Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the statements page

url.description: View all your transactions on our Statements page! Track credits and debits with ease, staying informed about your financial activity. Access a comprehensive overview of your transaction history, ensuring transparency and accountability. Simplify financial management and stay in control of your funds effortlessly.

image:image.image:title: Bank Transfer Page Image
image:image.image:caption: This is the image for the Bank Transfer page

url.description: Initiate fund requests on /bank/transfer! Users can submit withdrawal requests for admin approval. Seamlessly manage requests, empowering admins to approve or deny withdrawals, ensuring smooth fund transfers. Simplify financial transactions and maintain control over fund disbursements with our streamlined process.
